title: Bug after bug after bug
body:
I queue up for a simple co-op match, and in champ select I realize that all but two of my purchased rune pages are gone, so I have to quickly wipe and redo the page I wanted. We load into the match, and the game freezes at 00:00 before resuming a second later at 00:07.

And then a teammate says their emotes are gone, and I realize that mine are gone as well.

And one of the bots is inactive even though no one's disconnected.

While I play at 30FPS on a rig that used to run the game at 60FPS.

But at least this time the client didn't tell me I declined a match 30 seconds after I click Accept.

Having this many highly-visible broken windows looks really bad.

replies.body: Y-day I played 2 games, all normal, then next 2 games i had huge fps drops (we're talking from 60-70 to 20-30) and my matches were starting at 00:07 aswell. Idk wtf is going on
